-e ---

𒋛𒀀 (ligature)

𒋛𒀀 (DIRI)

Sumerogram of watārum (“to exceed”)

Sumerian
Noun

𒋛𒀀 • (diri, dirig /dirig/)

excess

Verb

𒋛𒀀 • (diri, dirig /dirig/)

to exceed, surpass  
to be big, huge, abundant  
to be excellent, supreme  
to be powerful, competent

Etymology 2
Verb

𒋛𒀀 • (diri, dirig /dirig/)

to float, glide
